titleStmt.title: Roaring Dick of Douer, or, The Iouiall good fellow of Kent that ne'r is willing to giue ouer, till all his money be spent : to the tune of Fuddle, roare and swagger / [by] R.C.
titleStmt.author: Crimsal, Richard.
